metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2245 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
rss/file.php in Moodle through 2.1.10, 2.2.x before 2.2.11, 2.3.x before2.3.8, 2.4.x before 2.4.5, and 2.5.x before 2.5.1 does not properlyimplement the use of RSS tokens for impersonation, which allows remoteauthenticated users to obtain sensitive block information by reading an RSSfeed.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2245` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.1-1').
